Hi, I'm here to keep Mastodon a beautiful place. I post an excerpt of #medieval #bookIllumination 🏰📖 every day at 7 AM CET, showcasing the intricate artistry of the #MiddleAges.

We explore the fascinating world of medieval art, where hidden humor🐒, stunning visuals 👹, and rich history 🪽 come together to challenge misconceptions. Let's appreciate the vibrant world of medieval manuscripts and discover how the Middle Ages were far from dark.

#medievalillumination #MedievalArt 🎭🖼️

note:
Anarchiste, enfin je crois. Un peu fol un peu perdu.

J'essaye de m'agiter au plus par peur du vide, de l'ennui quitte à faire progresser un peu le monde.

Pas là pour aider, mais pour secouer le vieux monde qui meurt, comme une piñata. Peut-être que quelques friandises en tombera.

Et je fais des jeux de mots hilarants aussi.

Ici pour partager différents Fils et Lubies.

I discuss the world's darkness in frank terms. Often, this is not a happy space.

I sometimes post links to longer essays at my Wordpress blog: https://hauntedtimber.wordpress.com/

👉 No warranty is provided for anything produced herein. Contents may be broken upon arrival, more often than not. Caveat emptor.

👉 Reply guys/people encouraged to fuck off.

👉 I regularly mute notifications for my threads. The Void hears your cries but I do not.
